title: If I have I phone 11 pro should I buy the new I phone 12? - World Of Smartphones - Quora

response.answer_text: I will suggest you to stay with the iPhone 11 but if you need 5G and better cameras then upgrade to iPhone 12. In case of performance, you will not feel it in day to day usage.
No, i will advice you to stick with your existing iphone 11 pro. Rest is upto you. Thank you, peace ✌️.
response.upvotes: Submission accepted by Devil May Cry
